text: Going forward with the XML-RPC in JavaScript project. I realized I should must include an HTTP server in the package. It's nice that you can use the protocol over any transport, and use JSON in place of XML, but there is a standard, RPC over XML via HTTP. So this is what a typical server looks like with those assumptions. Much simpler than it would otherwise be, which of course is the point of using XML-RPC. :grin:
